body:
### Problem

Crashes when trying to use `FelipeLema/cmp-async-path` and complete path. Appeared in recent nightly versions. 

```
nvim(45583,0x7ff85097a7c0) malloc: *** error for object 0xc55440b59200: pointer being freed was not allocated
nvim(45583,0x7ff85097a7c0) malloc: *** set a breakpoint in malloc_error_break to debug
```

Switch to `hrsh7th/cmp-path` helps to mitigate this issue.

### Steps to reproduce

1. Use reproduction template
```
function getRepoNameFromUrl(url)
  -- Splitting the URL by "/"
  local parts = {}
  for part in string.gmatch(url, '[^/]+') do
    table.insert(parts, part)
  end
  -- The last element in the 'parts' table is the repository name
  return parts[#parts]
end

for _, url in pairs {
  'https://codeberg.org/FelipeLema/cmp-async-path.git',
  'https://github.com/hrsh7th/nvim-cmp',
} do
  local name = getRepoNameFromUrl(url)
  local install_path = vim.fn.fnamemodify('nvim_issue/' .. name, ':p')
  if vim.fn.isdirectory(install_path) == 0 then
    vim.fn.system { 'git', 'clone', '--depth=1', url, install_path }
  end
  vim.opt.runtimepath:append(install_path)
end

local cmp = require('cmp')

cmp.register_source('cmp-async-path', require('cmp_async_path').new())

cmp.setup({
  mapping = cmp.mapping.preset.insert({
    ['<C-b>'] = cmp.mapping.scroll_docs(-4),
    ['<C-f>'] = cmp.mapping.scroll_docs(4),
    ['<C-Space>'] = cmp.mapping.complete(),
    ['<C-e>'] = cmp.mapping.abort(),
    ['<CR>'] = cmp.mapping.confirm({ select = true }), -- Accept currently selected item. Set `select` to `false` to only confirm explicitly selected items.
  }),
  sources = cmp.config.sources({
    { name = 'cmp-async-path' },
  }),
})
```

2. start neovim with any file: `$ nvim test.sh`

3. start writing path `#!/usr/bin/env` 

usually I get crash after trying to select second folder, but sometimes it crashes after first `/`. 

https://github.com/neovim/neovim/assets/12214583/961c6ee5-9642-4d99-be35-d87cc808405b

### Expected behavior

show completion of files without crashing

### Neovim version (nvim -v)

v0.10.0-dev-2483+g6ab0876f5

### Vim (not Nvim) behaves the same?

-

### Operating system/version

macos 14.3.1

### Terminal name/version

kitty 0.32.2

### $TERM environment variable

xterm-kitty

### Installation

tested with nightly builds and builded from repo

Issue is also specific to https://github.com/FelipeLema/cmp-async-path which is archived.

Closing until more specific information is provided.

@lewis6991 updated reproduction, I'll add video little bit later. 

Repo archived only on github. I provided not github link: https://codeberg.org/FelipeLema/cmp-async-path

Either way, you should raise an issue with the plugin author who can probably look at this more closely.

I'm not sure anyone here will look into this without more information on what exactly is happening. We need a backtrace or something.
I'm also experiencing this crash. @lewis6991 how can I get a backtrace for you?
